title.rendered: New Feature: Support for Docker Compose Version 2

content.rendered:
Codefresh supports Docker Compose Version 1 by default, but now you have the option to use the new file format. Docker Compose V2 introduces three new top levels keys: services, networks and volumes. You can create and run your application in an isolated environment and interact with it to find links and dependencies. Click here to learn more about Docker Compose Version 2.

​

To work with Docker Compose V2, go to the Compositions tab in your Codefresh account and click on any of your compositions. Then switch from Basic to Advanced mode in the top right corner.

If you don’t have a Codefresh account, sign up for free
